hero.description: I'm a 4th-year engineering student passionate about building scalable, user-centric web applications and exploring innovative solutions in cloud and AI technologies.

about.title: About
about.subtitle: Me
about.lead: Hello! I'm Yassir, a 4th-year engineering student with a relentless drive for understanding how things work beneath the surface.
about.p1: My journey into software engineering began with a fascination for problem-solving and logic. Fast-forward to today, I've had the privilege of building software for hackathons, contributing to open-source projects, and developing solutions ranging from voice cloning APIs to specialized dashboards.
about.p2: I thrive in environments where I can leverage my academic foundation in engineering to tackle real-world software architecture challenges. Whether it's optimizing a backend service or crafting a pixel-perfect UI, I approach every task with a commitment to excellence.

frontend.title: Frontend Development
frontend.description: Building responsive, accessible, and highly interactive user interfaces using React, Vue, and modern CSS architectures.

backend.title: Backend Engineering
backend.description: Designing robust APIs and microservices with deep focus on performance, security, and scalable database schemas.

cloud.title: Cloud & Infrastructure
cloud.description: Deploying and orchestrating resilient cloud infrastructures and implementing CI/CD pipelines.

voicelegacy.description: A comprehensive voice cloning application allowing users to synthesize speech using AI. Built backend with FastAPI and deployed to Hugging Face Spaces, with a React frontend hosted on Vercel.

diablife.description: An innovative healthcare dashboard designed for a hackathon. Integrated complex machine learning models into a user-friendly React interface with a robust reporting system.

mhealth.description: A mobile health (mHealth) backend and tracking application focused on recording and reporting user health metrics.

petyplant.description: 1st Place winning project at Hackathon Vert. An intelligent automatic watering system combined with a web platform and AI to analyze and optimize plant needs.

happlant.description: 2nd Place winning project at EMSI Innovation Competition. A plant surveillance and automated irrigation system featuring an AI chatbot for personalized botanical advice.

guidini.description: 2nd Prize winning project at Hackathon IA & Villes Résilientes 2030. A digital companion for authentic tourism experiences locally in Morocco, supporting World Cup 2030 initiatives.

wijha.description: Intelligent aid platform for travel organization. Full stack academic project featuring API integrations for hotels and automated visa condition verification.

infra_guard_part1.description: An infrastructure and security monitoring web interface prototype for system oversight.

taskmanager.description: A comprehensive task manager web application designed to help users organize their daily schedules and activities efficiently.

yazaki.title: Software Engineer Intern
yazaki.description: Summer internship focused on Software Infrastructure and Software Design in Tangier.

lear.title: Software Engineer Intern
lear.description: Summer internship focused on Preventive Maintenance and System Repair.

merge.title: Honorary Participation Award
merge.description: Selected among top 20 projects globally for "VoiceLegacy", an AI-powered voice preservation platform built with FastAPI, React, and ElevenLabs API.

guidini.title: 2nd Prize Winner
guidini.description: Won 2nd place with "Guidini", a digital companion offering authentic tourism experiences and local employment opportunities for World Cup 2030.

petyplant.title: 1st Place Winner - Hackathon Vert
petyplant.description: Led "Team Thinkera" to victory with "PetyPlant", an intelligent automatic watering system and AI-driven plant community platform.

happlant.title: 2nd Place Winner - Innovation Competition
happlant.description: Awarded for "HapPlant", a plant surveillance and automated irrigation system integrating an AI chatbot for personalized advice.

cyber.title: Cybersecurity Workshop Animator
cyber.description: Organized and co-animated workshops on Reverse Engineering, Pentesting, and Cryptography at EMSI and Lycée Technique Moulay Youssef.

president.title: President / Engineering Student
president.description: Studying Software Engineering while serving as President of InnovXtech Club since 2026. Delivered "Wijha" (intelligent travel organization platform using Laravel/Tailwind) as an academic project.

contact.title: Get In
contact.subtitle: Touch
contact.description: I'm currently looking for new opportunities. Whether you have a question or just want to say hi, I'll try my best to get back to you!
